draw::DataSet Class Reference

Public Member Functions

void set (const float *data, size_t n)
 

Member Function Documentation

void draw::DataSet::set ( const float *  data,
size_t  n 
)
inline

Set the data pointer and number of points.

This sets the data to use in the graph. The caller needs to manage the memory for the data points. This object simply has a pointer to the external data.

Parameters
dataA pointer to the data
nThe number of data points
